Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch 2.0 - ALAS2LIVEPATCH-2021-064: important priority package update for kernel-livepatch-4.14.238-182.422
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2021-40490:
	A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. A race condition was discovered in the ext4 subsystem. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.
2001951: CVE-2021-40490 kernel: race condition was discovered in ext4_write_inline_data_end in fs/ext4/inline.c in the ext4 subsystem
